name: Lystrosaurus
description: The Lystrosaurus has a robust physique, characterized by strong limbs and a large head, making it adept in physical confrontations.
memorable: It can knock targets prone with its headbutt and follow up with a deadly bite attack, adding tactical depth to its combat.
goals: Engages in physical confrontations with significant damage output, relying on melee attacks.
relations: Could be encountered alongside other beasts or serve as a guardian for a territory.
environment: Typically found in rugged terrains or regions with ample vegetation.
strengths: High strength and constitution scores enhance its physical attack capabilities and durability.
weaknesses: Lacks ranged attacks and has low dexterity, making it vulnerable to agile opponents.
attacks: Utilizes a ram attack for bludgeoning damage and a potent bite attack for piercing damage.
most_powerful_ability: The ability to knock opponents prone with its headbutt and then attack them while they are vulnerable adds a tactical edge in battle.
senses: Possesses a passive perception of 13, indicating decent awareness of its surroundings.
skills: Proficient in athletics, making it a competent climber, and has moderate perception capabilities.
additional_information: Strong physical combatant with significant melee damage output.
Can knock opponents prone to follow up with additional damage.
Has a good constitution save, increasing its resilience.
Average dexterity limits its ability to evade attacks.
Low intelligence and charisma affect its problem-solving and social interactions.
test_queries: robust beast that knocks foes prone
strong physical beast with deadly bite
powerful melee attacker with good agility
